name.ja: ビデオスピードコントローラー

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video Speed Controller for netflix video, primevideo, hotstar, etc.
short.es: Activate this extension to control the video speed for Netflix video, Prime Video, Hot Star, and more
short.hi: नेटफ्लिक्स-वीडियो, प्राइमवीडियो, हॉटस्टार आदि के लिए वीडियो स्पीड कंट्रोलर
short.ja: この拡張機能を有効にして、Netflix ビデオ、Prime Video、Hot Star などのビデオ速度を制御します
short.kn: Netflix ವೀಡಿಯೊ, ಪ್ರಧಾನ ವೀಡಿಯೊ, ಹಾಟ್ ಸ್ಟಾರ್ ಮತ್ತು ಹೆಚ್ಚಿನವುಗಳಿಗಾಗಿ ವೀಡಿಯೊ ವೇಗವನ್ನು ನಿಯಂತ್ರಿಸಲು ಈ ವಿಸ್ತರಣೆಯನ್ನು ಸಕ್ರಿಯಗೊಳಿಸಿ
short.ko: Netflix Video, Prime Video, Hot Star 등의 비디오 속도를 제어하려면 이 확장 프로그램을 활성화하세요.
short.ml: Netflix വീഡിയോ, പ്രൈം വീഡിയോ, ഹോട്ട് സ്റ്റാർ എന്നിവയ്ക്കും മറ്റും വീഡിയോ വേഗത നിയന്ത്രിക്കാൻ ഈ വിപുലീകരണം സജീവമാക്കുക
short.ru: Активируйте это расширение, чтобы контролировать скорость видео для Netflix Video, Prime Video, Hot Star и других.
short.ta: Netflix வீடியோ, Prime Video, Hot Star மற்றும் பலவற்றிற்கான வீடியோ வேகத்தைக் கட்டுப்படுத்த, இந்த நீட்டிப்பைச் செயல்படுத்தவும்
short.te: నెట్‌ఫ్లిక్స్-వీడియో, ప్రైమ్‌వీడియో, హాట్‌స్టార్ మొదలైన వాటి కోసం వీడియో స్పీడ్ కంట్రోలర్
short.tr: Netflix videosu, Prime Video, Hot Star ve daha fazlasının video hızını kontrol etmek için bu uzantıyı etkinleştirin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you struggling with changing the video speed control on the streaming services such as Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Youtube, Twitch, and Disney+ Hotstar? Get the Video Speed Controller Chrome extension to enable the best video watching experience.  

Conveniently control the speed of the track from 0. 25x to 4. Its time to add 0x on your favorite streaming platforms to save time, to learn faster or just watch the videos in your convenient speed. 

Key Features: 

Adjustable Playback Speed: You can easily adjust the speed of the video playback to the one you are comfortable with. 

User-Friendly Interface: Some of the controls are easily accessible through a pop-up window. 

Keyboard Shortcuts: Fine tuning that can be done through simple key commands. 

Supports Multiple Platforms: Supporting most of the streaming services including Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, YouTube, Twitch, Disney+ Hotstar. 

 
How to Use Video Speed Controller Extension: 

Install the Extension: Download the extension and place it on the Chrome browser and then install it, which is a one-time activity. 

Open a Video: Go to any video of your choice on the preferred streaming site. 

Access the Extension: Go to the browser toolbar and click on the icon of the extension. 

Set Playback Speed: In this case, the extension has a pop-up where you can set the desired playback speed. 

Enjoy Your Video: The selected settings are immediately assigned to the video. 

 

Keyboard Shortcuts: 
 
1. Increase Speed: 

Windows & Linux: Ctrl + Shift + Right 

Mac OS: In the case of Mac OS, shortcut keys include; Command + Shift + Right 

2. Decrease Speed: 

Windows & Linux: Ctrl+Shift+Left 

Mac OS: There, one can use the keyboard shortcut Command + Shift + Left 

3. Open Extension: 

Windows & Linux: The hotkeys which can be used to open this menu are Ctrl + Shift + J. 

Mac OS: Option + J 

4. Additional Functionality: 

Reset Speed: Use a single click to set the playback speed back to normal, which is 1. 0x. 

Step Adjustments: To have a finer control over the speed, adjust it in smaller steps. 

We are now ready to take a break! Try out the playback controls to get the best speed for watching the movie.
long.es,hi,kn,ml,ru,ta,te,tr:
Get Video Speeder Chrome Extension to fast forward any video for 1.5X, 2X and other settings. Also, works with 0.5X and 0.75X

Here is how to use:
>>Open any video on streaming site
>>Click on the extension icon
>>Choose the speed settings and it will be automatically applied to the video
>>Watch and make changes at any time
long.ja,ko:
Do you find it difficult to adjust the video playback speed on streaming platforms like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, and Disney+ Hotstar?  

Presenting Video Speed Controller, a Google Chrome extension that lets you fine-tune the playback settings on your favourite streaming website.

0.5X, 0.75x, 1.5x...the extension supports all kinds of playback settings.

How to use Video Speed Controller Extension:
- Install the extension (one-time process).
- Open any video on your desired streaming website.
- Click on the extension’s icon.
- Use the extension’s pop-up to specify the video playback settings.
- The chosen settings are applied to the video.

Now sit back and relax! Play around with the playback options to see what fits you the best. 

Version 2.0.0 changes:
>> Works on all streaming sites
>> Supports on every video playback
>> Supports up to 10 languages
>> Improved UI & bug fixes

Privacy Policy link: https://videospeeder.com/privacy-policy/
